appendix.title: Exception
appendix.para: ExceptionException.exceptionmessage='Exception' Returns a new Exception with the given message.
ExceptionException.newmessage='Exception' Returns a new Exception with the given message.
ArrayException#backtrace Returns the backtrace as an Array of Strings.
ExceptionException#exceptionmessage Returns the receiver if no argument is given; otherwise, creates a new instance of the receiver’s class with the given message.
ArrayException#set_backtracearray Sets this Exception’s backtrace to the given Array of Strings.
ObjectException#to_s Returns the message or, if that’s not set, the class name of this Exception.
